U

Unlocker - Class in logic
This class is used to represent possible exits openers for the Hero on the current Map.
Unlocker(int, int, char, boolean) - Constructor for class logic.Unlocker
Creates an Unlocker in preferred x and y values and given symbol.
Unlocker(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class logic.Unlocker
Creates an Unlocker in preferred x and y values and predefined symbol 'k'.
updateGame(char) - Method in class logic.Game
Updates this Game status based on a char that acts as a position modifier for the Hero.
updateGuard() - Method in class logic.Drunken
Updates this Drunken status accordingly to it current state.
updateGuard() - Method in class logic.Guard
If the Guard can move retrieves the next value of its route.
updateGuard(boolean) - Method in class logic.Guard
If the Guard can move retrieves the next value of its route considering the route's orientation.
updateGuard() - Method in class logic.Suspicious
Updates this Drunken status accordingly to its current state.
updateHero() - Method in class logic.Hero
Updates this Hero position and flags having in consideration its current flags values
updateHeroMapObjects(Hero) - Method in class logic.Map
Checks Hero c possible collisions and updates its status accordingly.
updateMap(char) - Method in class logic.Map
Updates all Character on Map accordingly to the heroCommand given by the player.
updateMapDisplay() - Method in class logic.Map
Updates all Characters on this Map map.
updateOgrePosition(Ogre) - Method in class logic.Map
Checks Ogre o possible collisions and updates its status accordingly.
updatePosition(char) - Method in class logic.Character
Set this Character x and y values accordingly to the command given.
updatePosition(char) - Method in class logic.Hero
Updates this Hero current position accordingly to the given command.
updatePosition(char, char) - Method in class logic.Ogre
Takes two char as reference for updating both this Ogre position on Map (x and y values) and its Weapon accordingly to its new position.
updatePosition(char) - Method in class logic.Weapon
Set this Weapon X and Y values accordingly to the command given.
